segments.text: I can’t believe what I’m seeing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she’s not even reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like it’s nothing, and it’s about to tip over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’ve never seen someone so focused on drying a plate while the world around them falls apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is a complete mess, and she’s just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
